scripts.build-local: bun _build_ui; bun _generate-static-bundle; bun build --define process.env.BUILD_DATE="'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'" index.ts --compile --sourcemap --outfile lite-queen; cp lite-queen ~/lite-queen
scripts.build-dist-linux-x64: bun _build_ui; bun _generate-static-bundle; bun build --define process.env.BUILD_DATE="'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'" index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64-baseline --outfile dist/lite-queen-linux-x64
scripts.build-dist-linux-arm64: bun _build_ui; bun _generate-static-bundle; bun build --define process.env.BUILD_DATE="'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'" index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64  --outfile dist/lite-queen-linux-arm64
scripts.build-dist-darwin-x64: bun _build_ui; bun _generate-static-bundle; bun build --define process.env.BUILD_DATE="'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'" index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64  --outfile dist/lite-queen-darwin-x64
scripts.build-dist-darwin-arm64: bun _build_ui; bun _generate-static-bundle; bun build --define process.env.BUILD_DATE="'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'" index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64  --outfile dist/lite-queen-darwin-arm64
